verses.name: Leviticus 10:4
verses.text: And Moses called Mishael and Elzaphan, the sons of Uzziel the uncle of Aaron, and said unto them, Come near, carry your brethren from before the sanctuary out of the camp.

verses.name: Leviticus 10:5
verses.text: So they went near, and carried them in their coats out of the camp; as Moses had said.

verses.name: Leviticus 10:6
verses.text: And Moses said unto Aaron, and unto Eleazar and unto Ithamar, his sons, Uncover not your heads, neither rend your clothes; lest ye die, and lest wrath come upon all the people: but let your brethren, the whole house of Israel, bewail the burning which the Lord hath kindled.
